question:
Consider the following comparisons of the Local Area Network (LAN) and Wide Area Network (WAN):
1. The maximum speed of data transfer of LAN is much lesser than a WAN
2. A printer can be shared on a LAN but not a WAN
3. LAN uses the Ethernet standard, while a WAN uses the T1 standard
Which among the above is / are correct statements?
explanation: The speed of data transfer of LAN is much higher than a WAN. A printer can be shared on a both LAN and WAN. LAN uses the Ethernet standard, while a WAN uses the T1 standard. A T1 standard line enables transmission service which uses 2 pair copper wires to send and receive data.
